Description: Ostracon, pottery fragment with six lines of a Greek text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (392589) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/392589)
Almásy-Martin and Duttenhöfer 2019 / Greek tax receipts from Abydos in the British Museum (no.2; 86-87)
